message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've got to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice, but $105 is still a bit too high for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $97.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $99?
